translations: v．（船）沉没；（计划、事业等）失败；（动物）跛行；（人）疲惫不堪。
· The ship foundered in the storm.
那艘船在暴风雨中沉没了。

sentences.sentence: Our boat foundered on a reef.
The peace talks foundered on a basic lack of trust.
sentences.translation: 由于缺乏基本信任，和平谈判搁浅。

sentences.sentence: The talks have foundered, largely because of the reluctance of some members of the government to do a deal with criminals.
sentences.translation: 会谈已经搁浅了，主要是因为一些政府成员不愿意和罪犯们达成协议。
